sentences.en: "There's no call for talk like that," Mrs. Evans reproved him.
sentences.cn: “没有必要说那种话，”埃文斯太太责备他道。

sentences.en: As many as I love I reprove and discipline; be zealous therefore and repent.
sentences.cn: 19凡我所爱的,我就责备管教; 所以你要发热心,也要悔改.

sentences.en: He will surely reprove you , if ye do secretly accept persons.
sentences.cn: 10你们若暗中徇情,他必要责备你们.

sentences.en: He will surely reprove you If you secretly show partiality.
sentences.cn: 伯13:10你们若暗中徇情、他必要责备你们.

sentences.en: How forcible are right words! but what doth your arguing reprove?
sentences.cn: 25正直的言语力量何其大. 但你们责备是责备什么 呢 .

sentences.en: How forcible are right words! but what doth your reprove?
sentences.cn: 25正直的言语力量何其大! 但你们责备是责备甚么 呢 ?

sentences.en: I do not reprove you for your sacrifices, And your burnt offerings are continually before Me.
sentences.cn: 诗50:8我并不因你的祭物责备你.你的燔祭常在我面前.

sentences.en: I have to reprove you for repeating the same mistakes over and over again.
sentences.cn: 你屡屡重犯同样的错误,我不得不严厉地批评你.

sentences.en: I stand correct and reprove myself.
I suppose I deserve that you should reprove my shortcomings.
sentences.cn: 你指责我的缺点,这是完全应该的.

sentences.en: KJV He will surely reprove you, if ye do secretly accept persons.
sentences.cn: [新译]你们若暗中徇情面,他必然责备你们.

sentences.en: Reprove your friend privately, commend him puBlicly.
sentences.cn: 对朋友要私下责备, 公开赞扬.

sentences.en: She again found herself unable to reprove him.
sentences.cn: 她又一次发现自己难以开口责备他.

sentences.en: The natural day is very calm, and will hardly reprove his indolence.
sentences.cn: 时光的天性就是沉静, 它不会因此而责备自己的懒惰.

sentences.en: These teachers will not be angry, nor reprove student.
sentences.cn: 这些老师从不会生气, 也不会数落学生.

sentences.en: Your own wickedness will correct you, And your apostasies will reprove you.
sentences.cn: 19你自己的恶必惩治你, 你背道的事必责备你.

trans.tran_en: to criticize someone for something that they have done
